roles.title: Director of Engineering
summary: Leader of leaders, responsible for organizational design, staffing decisions and project delivery across multiple engineering teams
Strategic partner to cross-functional leaders, internal and external stakeholders
Guiding strategy, investment and alignment across several workstreams, anticipating needs 3-12 months out
Creating practical process to speed up task delivery and foster collaboration

Hiring manager, interviewing potential candidates on site and over the phone for front-end openings across Red Ventures

Directly managing a four-person front-end team, which includes task check-ins as well as long-term skills and professional development
Interviewing potential candidates for front-end openings across Red Ventures

roles.title: Front-End Developer

Built and manged multiple domains in a fast-pace project lifecycle

Wrote extensible JS for the client and for Gulp/Node tasks to improve workflow and the deploy processes
